text: Balandela okwakusenziwa ngenkohliso zizingcoli ngokuchasene nobukumkani bukaSulaymân35: Abachasi bokholo yayingengoSulaymân koko yayizizingcoli, ezafundisa abantu ukwenza imilingo nezinye izinto (zobugqi) ezikwanjalo ezehla eBhabheli kwiingelosi ezimbini, uHârût noMârût. Akukho nanye kuzo eyafundisa mntu (ezi zinto) ingakhanga ithi: “Thina siluvavanyo (kuni); ke Musani ukwenza izenzo zokungakholwa”. Bafunda (abantu), kuzo apho iindlela zokuhlwayela impixano phakathi kwendoda nomfazi wayo kodwa ke babengekhe bonzakalise mntu kungengamvume ka-Allâh kwaye bafunda okwaba yingozi kubo, hayi okwaba yinzuzo kubo. Kananjalo babesazi okokuba abathengi (bemilingo36) abayi kuba nasabelo kulonwabo loBomi oBuzayo. Akusangcole oko bathengisa ngemiphefumlo yabo kuko ukuba babesazi
